HTMLQuiz.question: What is the header tag name for header 1?
HTMLQuiz.feedback: The correct answer is h1.

HTMLQuiz.question: Which image displays the right way to add an external Javascript file to your html?
HTMLQuiz.feedback: The third choice is the correct answer. The attribute src is used when importing the Javascript file in the HTML.

HTMLQuiz.question: What does HTML stand for?
HTMLQuiz.feedback: The correct answer is Hyper Text Markup Language. It is used on World Wide Web pages to display content on webpages.

HTMLQuiz.question: Which answers below are valid HTML tags?
HTMLQuiz.feedback: The correct answer is script which is used to add Javascript and iframe which embedes another doc into your HTML document. The tag used to create a form element is form, not formContent.

HTMLQuiz.question: You add the title element in the body of your page.
HTMLQuiz.feedback: The title would be defined in the head of your HTML.

HTMLQuiz.question: Enter the tag name used for a bullet list.
HTMLQuiz.feedback: A bullet list would use ul as an unirdered list.

HTMLQuiz.question: Once you deploy your site on the internet, what is the name of the address used to access the site?
HTMLQuiz.feedback: The correct answer is URL. WWW or the World Wide Web is used to access your network and file:/ may be the path used to access files on your local machine. URL is the address used to access your site once it is deployed online.

HTMLQuiz.question: What language is used to style your HTML webpage?
HTMLQuiz.feedback: CSS is used to style element on your webpage, whereas Javascript and JQuery may be added for functionality or responsive design.

HTMLQuiz.question: You cannot add Javascript into the body of your HTML.
HTMLQuiz.feedback: Javascript can be added in both the head and body of your code.

HTMLQuiz.question: Enter the tag name used to add a paragraph element (do not use tags)
HTMLQuiz.feedback: The correct answer is p.

HTMLQuiz.question: What tag is used to define a table row?
HTMLQuiz.feedback: The correct syntax is tr, which is known as table row.

HTMLQuiz.question: Which CSS attribute is used to change the color of font?
HTMLQuiz.feedback: The attribute to set the color of font is color. Font-color and fColor are not valid.

HTMLQuiz.question: Which attributes are used when adding an external CSS file to HTML?
HTMLQuiz.feedback: Link is used as the HTML tag to link HTML and external resource, but is not an attribute, however rel and href are.

HTMLQuiz.question: br tag is used to add a new line
HTMLQuiz.feedback: br  is used to add a new line between elements.

HTMLQuiz.question: How many heading types are there?
HTMLQuiz.feedback: The correct answer is 6. They are h1 , h2 , h3 , h4 , h5 , h6

HTMLQuiz.question: What type of styling does span add to your HTML?
HTMLQuiz.feedback: The correct answer is inline, as it does not create an extra space.

HTMLQuiz.question: What is the input type of a checkbox?
HTMLQuiz.feedback: The correct answer is checkbox type used when declaring a checkbox form.

HTMLQuiz.question: Which tags below are used when creating a table?
HTMLQuiz.feedback: The correct answer is table and th. The other tag, iframe, is used to embed other content.

HTMLQuiz.question: !DOCTYPE html tag comes from HTML4.
HTMLQuiz.feedback: !DOCTYPE html tag comes from HTML5.

HTMLQuiz.question: What keyword forces a user to submit a form?
HTMLQuiz.feedback: The required keyword forces the user to enter a response before submitting.
